root.Summary: 1: Fontenla S, Dell'Oca N, Smircich P, Tort JF, Siles-Lucas M. The miRnome ofFasciola hepatica juveniles endorses the existence of a reduced set of highlydivergent micro RNAs in parasitic flatworms. Int J Parasitol. 2015 Sep 30. pii:S0020-7519(15)00248-9. doi: 10.1016/j.ijpara.2015.06.007. [Epub ahead of print]PubMed PMID: 26432296.
